comment: Make sure you participate in class. She gives pop quizzes if she feels participation is low. No tests. quizzes are online and theyre super easy. Shes strict on attendance
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Amazing lectures

comment: Definitely recommend Prof Heuwagen! NO TESTS.. Final is OPTIONAL to help your grade if needed. (Final brought my grade to an A!) Attendance is 15% of your overall grade, and you only get 1 free absence.. I missed a few classes and had a Zero in attendance but still managed to get an A. A few group discussions in class followed by a class debate.
She's a choice for a professor of L&S, but she has her moments. Very knowledgable and open to questions and curiosities.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: All 6 quizzes come directly from the book (can find free online) or from quizlet (google). Attendance is all or nothing so if you miss more than 1 class you will get a 0 for attendance. Daily readings&videos can be done the night before to prep for class discussions. Gives out 100s on the papers as long as you cite sources. Easy A
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: She is a bit sassy but it's not a problem if you're not a problem student. She gives homework to read a chapter or a video to discuss in class if most of the class doesn't do it then there will most likely be a pop quiz. Take notes for her online quizzes and don't miss more than 1 class unexcused. attendance at the end of the yr is a 100 or a 0.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: She is funny, empathetic, enjoyable. The textbook is pretty expensive, so find somewhere to rent it for a good price. Also, it was a lot of reading because the chapters were long, but most of the time, I would just skim through for 10-15 minutes because it wasn't difficult information. She will give pop q's if she wants to check if you read / not!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Inspirational--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: Very interesting class and very interesting professor. She does give lots of homework and online quizzes. She also takes attendance and counts off for missing more than one day. She is a very likable person, but if you dont put effort in you will not get a desirable grade.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Get ready to read

comment: Professor Heuwagen is the most amazing person. She's sassy and funny, but she means business at the same time. She's so funny and relatable in class and she genuinely cares about all of her students. The class is a great time. Very fun and informative. 100% would take her again. I love her.

This class is interesting and easy! She wil give occasional pop quizzes, and there are quizzes online too. The only test is a final that's online. You will need the book and will have to read or watch videos almost everyday.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Great professor! Loves what she does and her students. The class is mostly open discussion after her power points, after that you talk about the topic at hand. A couple of papers and the abortion debate are your biggest grades, quizzes online and out of class. She uses her class time wisely and doesn't waste a minute.

I loved this professor so much. I had for my 9am and honestly she was my favorite professor I've had so far. She's upfront and straightforward, assignments aren't hard at all. There are a few pop quizzes but if you do the reading you will be fine. Would absolutely take her again

I love her class so much. She is very funny and the perfect teacher for this course because of how opened minded she is. The attendance is mandatory and I took a 9am, but I was always excited to go to her class. You do have to do a little bit of reading but it only helps you with discussions.

There aren't any tests in this class, only quizzes,a few papers, a class debate, and a final. Clear grading criteria/rubrics for every assignment so you should do well if you follow directions. You do learn a lot in this class and she is very passionate and entertaining when teaching this course. Attendance is mandatory and there are pop quizzes
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Clear grading criteria

comment: I love this professor so much. She's inspirational and I learned so much about life, people and sex in this class. She's easy to get along with and speaks so many words of wisdom. She takes random attendance and you only get one unexcused absence but to be honest, I never wanted to skip her class. Get ready to read.
rating_tags: Respected--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.
